channel.title: Need help with drops (PI)
channel.description:
Ok so im trying to get my npcs to drop stuff along with npcconstants i know how that works but like in my npcdrops.tsm its like this
#Rock Crab 1265:50
1265= rock crab id, but whats the :50? what does the 50 represent? Some please tell me but also one more thing.. on every npc though, the 2nd st of #'s is different
so like
#Rock Crab 1265:50 #abyssal demon 1615:15
whats the 2nd digit of numbers? HELP Ok so im trying to get my npcs to drop stuff along with npcconstants i know how that works but like in my npcdrops.tsm its like this
#Rock Crab 1265:50
1265= rock crab id, but whats the :50? what does the 50 represent? Some please tell me but also one more thing.. on every npc though, the 2nd st of #'s is different
so like
#Rock Crab 1265:50 #abyssal demon 1615:15
whats the 2nd digit of numbers? HELP

item.title: Need help with drops (PI)
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“emtscape, post:9, topic:378546”]so say like 1265:50 1048:1 1050:1 4151:1 11842:1

THE 50 is the drop rate % for all of those items in that line? then if i want i can make moe than one drop thing for the rock crab and make dif drop rate % for dif items?[/quote]

the 50 is the rarity factor of the RARES, which are on the second line.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with drops (PI)
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

emtscape:

omg… u dont get what i mean, after the npc id… there is NPCid:and then a number so… 1265:50… why the heck is there a 50 after the rock crab’s id? and no the 1048:1, 1 in the drop isnt the drop rate cause all of my drops are :1 after the item id, cause if the drop rate was 1 it would take like 500 kills for the item…

I told you what i means.

Read full topic

emtscape:

omg… u dont get what i mean, after the npc id… there is NPCid:and then a number so… 1265:50… why the heck is there a 50 after the rock crab’s id? and no the 1048:1, 1 in the drop isnt the drop rate cause all of my drops are :1 after the item id, cause if the drop rate was 1 it would take like 500 kills for the item…

It’s the rarity.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with drops (PI)
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

1265:50

1265 - NPC Id

50 - Rarity for rare items.

Common items are on the first line, rares on the second

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with drops (PI)
item.dc:creator: @emtscape emtscape
item.description:
@emtscape wrote:

I mean just after the 1265, not after the item: then the 2nd number.

cause on 1265:50, if i delete the 50, then it wont drop at all…

Read full topic
